alert.note: Alert for Jones; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 6:27PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southwestern Shackelford and northern Taylor Counties through 715 PM CST... At 626 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Butman, or near Coronados Camp, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Wylie, Merkel, Tye, Hawley, View, Hamby, Coronados Camp, Caps, Dyess Afb, Impact, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Hodges, Camp Butman and Stith. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 269 and 291. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
